availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married H. A. Boyd. Father of M. A. Boyd. Farmer in Christian County in 1860 and 1863.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Unnamed District, p. 28; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Christian County, KY, July 1863, p. 2, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
